attributes.action: To reduce the (currently unsustainable) free bus fares for all Pensioners to HALF FARE,and introduce half fare for all schoolchildren up to the age of 18years providing they are still in fulltime education.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reduce the(currently unsustainable) free bus fares for all pensioners to HALF FARE and to introduce half fare to all schoolchildren in full time education (up to 18 years).This would alleviate the burdon on Education budgets,& promote more attendance in schools.Money saved could be re-distributed to spending on over 60's Health Budgets.We all need to take a fair share of what's available in the pot.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
